document_data.caption: A broadsheet being sold by a child in [[Baldur's Gate]].
document_data.name: Broadsheet
document_data.mainbody: A '''broadsheet''', also known as a '''short scroll''', was a short, printed document which usually contained tabloid-style news or political rants. They were common in [[Waterdeep]], where they were sold by broadcriers on the main streets.{{Cite digital book/Downshadow||28}}
